car.rmi.node

Interface RMINode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIGraphNodeImpl, RMITreeNodeImpl

    public interface RMINode
extends java.rmi.Remote
    RMI interface for a node A node own an unique identifier name and can propagate data
    Author:
    pierre falez, gaetan deflandre

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSuccessor(RMINode sucessor)
      add a successor node to the current node
      byte[] getLastData()
      Return the last received buffer with method propagate or null otherwise
      Trace getLastTrace()
      Return the last received trace with method propagate or null otherwise

      void propagate(byte[] data, int uid, Trace trace)
      this methods propagate data to its successors.
      void setName(java.lang.String name) 

    • Method Detail

      • propagate

        void propagate(byte[] data,
             int uid,
             Trace trace)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        this methods propagate data to its successors. If trace parameter is not null, he add itself into it before transmit it to its successors. the uid parameter is used to recognize the message. this can be usefull is cycles are present in the network
        Parameters:
        data - is an array of byte which contains the data to transfer
        uid - is an unique identifier for the message
        trace - is the node history in which the propagation pass through
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • addSuccessor

        void addSuccessor(RMINode sucessor)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        add a successor node to the current node
        Parameters:
        sucessor - is a rmi node
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:
